attributes.action: STOP WASTING TAXPAYERS MONEY-WHERE HAS ALL THE MONEY GONE? 20 POINT PLAN TO REVOLUTIONISE TAXES.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
600 BILLION SPENT,SPENDING DOUBLED: BILLIONS CAN BE SAVED BY 20 POINT PLAN:1.ABOLISH SCOTTISH/WELSH PARLIAMENTS (300% INCREASE IN COST ), 2.WITHDRAW TROOPS (NO WINNER IN AFGHAN'S HISTORY), 3.STOP BENEFITS TO 1.7 MILLION :1 MILLION VACANCIES  4.10 YEAR WAIT B4 MIGRANTS CLAIM BENEFITS,  5.FREEZE PAY- DOCTORS ( PAY  TREBLED): PAY NURSES, 6.SACK INCOMPETENT CIVIL SERVANTS,TEACHERS ETC.7.ADOPT U.S. STYLE PRISON CAMPS 8.ADOPT SINGAPORE STYLE: PUBLICLY SHAME CRIMINALS 9.TAX MOGHULS LIKE MURDOCH 10. GIVE TO CHARITIES NOT BILLIONS TO CORRUPT  GOVERNMENTS 11.ABOLISH ASSEMBLIES, QUANGOS/ TRUSTS 12. COMBAT CORRUPTION 13. STOP P.C.NESS: COMBAT TAX DODGERS /CRIME 14. MAKE NAT NOLLID ADVISOR FOR COMMON SENSE &POWER TO PEOPLE 15.RE-START BRITISH EMPIRE:        
 RE-COLONISE AUSTRALIA, EMPTY PRISONS - FILL LABOUR SHORTAGE: OUTBACK, 16. TAKE OWNERSHIP OF ENGLISH LANGUAGE& TAX  COUNTRIES THAT USE IT 17. STOP TAXING POOR- UNDERCLASS IS  EXPANDING- EARN LESS THAN 20K SHOULD PAY 10% TAX -PAY FOR THIS BY INCREASING TAXES- EARNING MORE THAN 100K 18.STOP  BUILDING -CREATING POLLUTION/GHETTOS 19. HELP NORTH: MOVE PARLIAMENT TO CENTRE OF GB  20. LEGALISE PROSTITUTION-CUT DISEASE, CRIME, STRESS

rejection.details: Please rewite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
